name: OD27_5dim_battlefield
title: OD27 fork of 5Dim's mod - New Battlefield
author: 5Dim
description:
Defenses for OD27 fork of 5Dim's mod
Add 2 new laser turret, 2 new gun turret, new tesla turret, new tiers of walls, gates and new radars
This mod include:
- All tiered turrets
- Tiered radars
- Tiered walls and gates
